ARABIC: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah has promised those who have iman and do right actions forgiveness and an immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God has made a promise of forgiveness and the highest reward to those who believe and perform good deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds forgiveness from sins and a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has promised forgiveness and a great reward to the righteously striving believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is Allah’s promise to those who believe and are righteous, that for them will be forgiveness and a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah has promised those who believe and do deeds of righteousness, that for them there is forgiveness and a great reward (i.e. Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah has promised to those who believe and do good deeds (that) they shall have forgiveness and a mighty reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God has promised those that believe, and do deeds of righteousness; they shall have; forgiveness and a mighty wage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah hath promised those who believe and do good works: Theirs will be forgiveness and immense reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God has promised those who believe and do good deeds forgiveness and a great reward;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah hath promised those who believe and work righteous works that for them shall be forgiveness; and a mighty hire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah has promised those who have faith and do righteous deeds forgiveness and a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To those who believe and do deeds of righteousness hath Allah promised forgiveness and a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah has promised those who believe (in the Oneness of Allah - Islamic Monotheism) and do deeds of righteousness, that for them there is forgiveness and a great reward (i.e. Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has promised those who believe and do good works forgiveness and a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God has promised those who believe and work righteousness: they will have forgiveness and a great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah has promised those who believe and do righteous deeds [that] for them there is forgiveness and great reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:9] God has promised those who believe and perform righteous deeds, an excellent promise: they shall have forgiveness and a great wage, that is, Paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Allah hath promised those who believe) in Muhammad and the Qur'an (and do good works) and do acts of obedience regarding that which is between them and their Lord: (Theirs will be forgiveness) of their sins in this world (and immense reward) in Paradise. 112
